description.value: You have comprehensive knowledge in your fields of interest. When you succeed at a Recall Knowledge check, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, you get additional information or context or can ask an additional follow-up question (the GM chooses which).

rules.text: When you roll a success at a Recall Knowledge, you learn an additional fact. When you critically succed, you can gain even more additional information or context than normal.
rules.title: {item|name}
